topics.body:
That reminds me.

Yesterday I was at my Doctors appointment waiting in the waiting room for hours right? Pretty boring, but you know what was even worse?

Guess what bullshit the staff decided to turn on tv?

_*FUCKING TMZ*_

Me my mom and my brother and everyone else were stuck listening to _*TMZ!*_

It was so bad the lady sitting next to us told us "I cant look at this anymore, I gotta go"

And locked herself in the bathroom.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
